tool_description: Smile provides user-authorized access to valuable employment and income data from HR, payroll, commerce, and marketplace platforms through a single API!
name: Smile
title: Smile

api_list.name: list-identities
api_list.description: Get a user's identity profiles from employment data sources.

optional_parameters.name: accountId
optional_parameters.description: Filter to those associated with a particular account ID.

optional_parameters.name: sourceId
optional_parameters.description: Filter to those associated with a particular source ID.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of objects you want returned in a collection.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Uses the filter values of the previous page to determine the next set of items.

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: Filter to those associated with a particular user ID.

api_list.name: list-providers
api_list.description: Get a list of employment data providers from the Smile Network.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by provider name

optional_parameters.name: subType
optional_parameters.description: Filter results to certain subset of a certain subtype of providers

optional_parameters.name: accountConnection
optional_parameters.description: Filter results to providers with real-time account connections.

optional_parameters.name: active
optional_parameters.description: Filter results to active or inactive providers.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of objects you want returned in a collection.

optional_parameters.name: enabled
optional_parameters.description: Filter results to enabled or disabled providers.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Uses the filter values of the previous page to determine the next set of items.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter results to certain type of providers.

requestId.title: Object-Metadata-Ref-RequestID
requestId.description: Unique ID that is added to the body of every response for easy traceability of the request in our logs.

nextCursor.title: Object-Next-Cursor
nextCursor.description: The next cursor value that can be used in the following query.

userId.description: User ID associated with this account

items.title: RawFile
items.description: Scanned or photographed document or form uploaded by the user to be able to share hardcopy employment and income information. File size limit is 15 MB.

format.description: File type (only JPEG, PNG, PDF, or TIFF formats are supported)

url.description: URL to access the file. URL will expire after 7 days
